Blog.post: haha ! omg today me and haylee were walking around and this old dude on a construction truck was staring at us ! OMG ewwwwww ! haha he drove by us like 3 times ! it was soo freaky ! haha and then we went back to her house and ate popcicles and popcorn and talked to her friends on msn ! haha ! aww i love your lizard its soo cute !! haha ! and your messy room ! haha it wasnt that messy:P ! haha mad jokes ! our conversation at the park was too funny ! haha o myyy ! im mad HYPER right now ! haha ! say hey hottie...why are you scared to call him !! haha lovee you tonz, --Stephh--

ughh omg i hate days like these when there is nothing at all to do ! they suck !! grrr pretty much all of my friends are gone !!! ahhhh ! i did nothing today accept went on the computer ! haha ! all i am doing now is listening to some music ! soo much fun ! haha ! even though i hate school i have been soo bored since it ending ! ahhh ! next year is going to be soo exciting im gradutating !! haha ! yay !! and then im off to high school with all the HOT BOYS ! aha ! well im out of stuff to write right now !! lovee you tonz , *Stephh...

ughh omg i hate days like these when there is nothing at all to do ! they suck !! grrr pretty much all of my friends are gone !!! ahhhh ! i did nothing today accept went on the computer ! haha ! all i am doing now is listening to some music ! soo much fun ! haha ! even though i hate school i have been soo bored since it ending ! ahhh ! next year is going to be soo exciting im gradutating !! haha ! yay !! and then im off to high school with all the HOT BOYS ! aha ! well im out of stuff to write right now !! lovee you tonz , *Stephh...

At nans was the best hahah !!! sneaking up in the middle of the night and getting ice-cream and waterr !!! haha and then trying make me faint !! i would have if i didnt laugh ! ahhh grrrr hehehe !! the tramp is the best hahah ! me and you are always trying to kill eachother hahah !! too funnyy mann !! hahah us shoppinggg !!!! me spending like all my money in one dayy ! hahaha !! but jumping on the tramp is the bestt ! haha and the other night when you had the thing on your neck that smelt rele bad ! ahhaa and megan spilling my waterr all over meee ! ahaha tonz of luv, *stephhh....
